content: They won't let you write a review about products sold and shipped by them if it's one star. Every reason they gave has been mentioned in other reviews. If you don't write anything, they won't let you leave a review. It's amazing how they can basically falsify information for their products.

Three weeks ago, I ordered the blu-ray disc for my gaming console to watch. When I inserted in, it gave me the "license restriction" message. I looked at the back of the blu-ray disc and it has Regional Code B, NOT A. I believe Amazon needs to look at the blu-ray discs CAREFULLY ON THE BACK instead of grabbing it and delivering it without assistance. THEREFORE, they gave me the WRONG BLU-RAY DISC WITH REGIONAL CODE B ON IT. Do it right.

J’ai activé Amazon Prime uniquement pour recevoir un produit (K18 Leave-In Mask 15ml) avant mon départ. J’ai passé la commande le 10 juin, et le service client m’a garanti une livraison avant le 14 au matin. Finalement, la commande n’est jamais arrivée, et j’ai dû annuler moi-même l’abonnement Prime sans avoir utilisé aucun avantage. Aucune compensation, aucun remboursement du service. Expérience très décevante pour une cliente fidèle. Cela m’a fait perdre confiance dans la fiabilité du service.

This app does not work for picking up purchased items. It requires both location services and Bluetooth to be enabled, but even when they are, it continues to prompt for them repeatedly. Amazon Lockers should offer alternative methods for item pickup that don't rely on a malfunctioning app...
